alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 28 at 8:13PM CDT until September 01 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Rankin and Madison Counties. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of low areas along and near the river is occurring. At 20.0 feet, Widespread flooding of lowlands upstream and downstream of the State Highway 35 bridge is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning and continue falling to 14.2 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Carthage 17.0 21.5 Sun 8 am CDT 19.6 18.0 16.1 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 900 AM CDT.
